ok, so...  This weekend I spent about 5 hours trying as many different forum apps which AREN'T written in PHP and found them all wanting.

all good stuff, but i'm scratching my head over how Wedge gained the authority to judge who would be worthy of a winner award. <3
I'm looking at the judges now and.... yes! It's 10's across the board! That was a spectacular burn, he'll be proud of that.</fake sports announcer>
He wins in my head. I know the standards in there aren't the highest, but respect is still being paid. Now i'll go to the corner and hang my head in shame.
